articles.title: South Korea wins big at Cannes Film Festival with Best Actor, Best Director awards - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Star film-maker Park Chan-wook clinched the best director award for his erotic crime movie Decision To Leave while Song Kang-ho, best known for his role in the Oscar-winning Parasite, picked up the best actor gong for Broker.
articles.content:
The South Korean cinema industry added to a global winning streak on Saturday (May 28) by scooping two key prizes at the Cannes Film Festival for a pair of beloved veterans.

articles.title: In her 40s, she walked away from a successful banking career to pursue her passion as a jazz musician - Channel NewsAsia
